TABLE.NAME: selflearn
TABLE.COMMENT: Defines an activity for students to complete a SelfLearn course (must be named as the plugin)

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the Moodle course, where to add the link to the SelfLearn course (must be named course)

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the teacher who defined the activity

FIELD.NAME: slug
FIELD.COMMENT: The slug of the selected SelfLearn course

FIELD.NAME: url
FIELD.COMMENT: The URL to the SelfLearn course

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The title of the course to display (must be name as this is used by Moodle to display activities)

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The time the settings for this assign module instance were last modified (required by Moodle).
